Product: All-new Echo (2nd Generation) with improved sound, powered by Dolby, and a new design Walnut Finish
Review_Summary: After researching The Amazon Echo and the Google Home equivalent, I decided to go with the Echo since that one was recommended for Apple users. I found the set up to be easy and very user friendly. I love it!

Product: All-new Echo (2nd Generation) with improved sound, powered by Dolby, and a new design Walnut Finish
Review_Summary: I like using Amazon Echo for playing calming music to help me fall asleep. I use it to play nature sounds for my dog while I am away.
